attributes.action: The Government to put pressure in the G8 so the everyone in the world has enough food
attributes.additional_details:
We want the Government to put pressure on the G8 so everyone in the world can have enough food. But that can only happen if world leaders act now.

When many of the worlds most powerful leaders meet in the UK in 2013 they have the power to change millions of peoples lives.

They can end world hunger.
